original: yadi hi vijñānātmā paramātmano'nya syāt tata paramātmavijñāne'pi vijñānātmā na vijñāyata ityeka vijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ yatpratijñātam, taddhīyeta |

analyzed: śrutiḥ ca evam bhavati eṣa saṃprasādaḥ usmāt śarīrāt samutthāya param jyotiḥ ūpasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate iti

analyzed: yathā loke nadyaḥ sva āśrayam eva nāma rūpam vihāya samudram upayanti evam jīvaḥ api sva āśrayam eva nāma rūpam vihāya param puruṣam upaiti iti hi tatra artha pratīyate dṛṣṭānta dāntikayoḥ tulya tāyai

analyzed: tatra kāśakṛtstrīyam matam śruti anusāri iti gamyate pratipipāda yiṣita artha anusārāt tat tvam asi ityādi śrutibhyaḥ

analyzed: vikāra ātmaka tve hi jīvasya abhyupagamyamāne vikārasya prakṛti saṃbandhe pralaya prasaṅgāt na tad jñānāt amṛta tvam avakalpeta

original: yadapyuktaṃ prakṛtasyaiva mahato bhūtasya draṣṭavyasya bhūtebhya samutthānaṃ vijñānātmabhāvena darśayanvijñānātmana evedaṃ draṣṭavyatvaṃ darśayatīti, tatrāpīyameva trisūtrī yojayitavyā |

original: upapāditaṃ ca sarvasya nāmarūpakarmaprapañcasyaikaprasavatvādekapralayatvācca dundubhyādidṛṣṭāntaiśca kāryakāraṇayoravyatirekapratipādanāt;

original: tasyā eva pratijñāyā siddhiṃ sūcayatyetalliṅgam, yanmahato bhūtasya bhūtebhyaḥ samutthānaṃ vijñānātmabhāvena kathitama ityāśmarathya ācāryo manyate abhede hi satyeka vijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñātamavakalpata iti |

original: utkramiṣyata evaṃbhāvādityauḍulomi 'utkramiṣyato vijñānātmano jñānadhyānādisāmarthyātsaṃprasannasya pareṇātmanaikyasūtrabhāṣye pā MA saṃbhavādidamabhedābhidhānamityauḍulomirācāryo manyate |

original: 'ava sthiteriti kāśakṛtstraḥ' asyaiva paramātmano'nenāpi vijñānātmabhāvenāvasthānādupapannamidamabhedābhidhānamiti kāśakṛtsna ācāryo manyate |
analyzed: ava sthiteḥ iti kāśakṛtstraḥ asya eva paramātmanā unena api vijñāna ātma bhāvena avasthānāt upapannam idam abheda abhidhānam iti kāśakṛtsnaḥ ācāryaḥ manyate

original: nanūcchedābhidhānametat 'etebhyo bhūtebhya samutthāya tānyevānuvinaśyati na pretya saṃjñāsti' iti;

analyzed: atra eva mā bhagavān amūmuhat na pretya saṃjñā asti iti paryanuyujya svayam eva śrutyā artha antarasya darśita tvāt na vai are ham moham bravīmi avināśī vai are iyam ātmā an ucchitti dharmā mātrā saṃsargaḥ tu asya bhavati iti

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati kūṭastha nitya evāyaṃ vijñānaghana ātmā;

original: nāsyocchedaprasaṅgo'sti;
analyzed: na asya uccheda prasaṅgaḥ usti

original: yadapyuktam'vi jñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' iti kartṛvacanena śabdenopasaṃhārādvijñānātmana evedaṃ draṣṭavyamiti, tadapi kāśakṛtstrīyenaiva darśanena pariharaṇīyam |

original: api ca 'yata hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati' ityārabhyāvidyāviṣaye tasyaiva darśaRESsū prathamo'dhyāyaḥ |

original: nādilakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣavijñānaṃ prapañcaya yatra tvasya sarvamātmai vābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' ityādinā vidyāviṣaye tasyaiva darśanādilakṣaṇasya viśeṣavijñānasyābhāvamabhidadhāti;

original: punaśca viṣayābhāve'pyātmānaṃ vijānīyādityāśaṅkaya, 'vijñātāra mare kena vijānīyāt' ityāha;

original: tataśca viśeṣavijñānābhāvopapādanaparatvādvākyasya vijñānadhātureva kevala sanbhūtapūrvaṃgatyā kartṛvacanena tṛcā nirdiṣṭa iti gamyate |
analyzed: tatas ca viśeṣa vijñāna abhāva upapādana para tvāt vākyasya vijñāna dhātuḥ eva kevala san bhūta pūrvaṃgatyā kartṛ vacanena tṛcāḥ nirdiṣṭaḥ iti gamyate

original: darśitaṃ tu purastātkāśakṛtstrīyasya pakṣasya śrutimattvam |

original: ataśca vijñānātmaparamātmanoravidyāpratyupasthāpita nāma rūparacitadehādyupādhinimitto bhedaḥ, na pāramārthika ityeṣo'rthaḥ sarvervedāntavādibhirabhyupagantavyaḥ 'sadeva somyedamapra āsīdekamevādvitīyam' 'ātmaivedaṃ sarvama brahmaivedaṃ sarvam idaṃ sarva yadayamātmā 'nānyo'to'sti draṣṭā 'nānyadato'sti draṣṭṛ' ityevaṃrūpābhyaḥ śrutibhyaḥ;
analyzed: atas ca vijñāna ātma paramātmanoḥ avidyā pratyupasthāpita nāma rūpa racita deha ādi upādhi nimittaḥ bhedaḥ na pāramārthikaḥ iti eṣa ṛthaḥ sarveḥ vedānta vādibhiḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ sat eva somya idam apre āsīt ekam eva advitīyam ātmā eva idam sarvam brahma eva idam sarvam idam sarva yat ayam ātmā na anyaḥ uta asti draṣṭā na anyat atas asti draṣṭṛ iti evaṃrūpābhyaḥ śrutibhyaḥ

original: smṛtibhyaśca 'vāsudevaḥ sarvamiti' 'kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarvakṣetreṣu bhārata 'samaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tiṣṭhantaṃ parameśvaram' ityevarūpābhya ;
analyzed: smṛtibhyaḥ ca vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti kṣetrajñam ca api mām viddhi sarva kṣetreṣu bhārata samam sarveṣu bhūteṣu tiṣṭhantam parameśvaram iti eva rūpābhyaḥ

original: bhedadarśanāpavādācca 'anyo'sāvanyo'hamasmīti na sa veda yathā paśu' ‘mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati 'ityevaṃjātīyakāt;

original: ‘sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmājaro'marosūtrabhāṣye pā 'mṛto'bhayo brahma' iti ca ātmani sarvavikriyāpratiṣedhāna;
analyzed: sa vai eṣa mahān ajaḥ ātmā ajaraḥ maro sūtrabhāṣye mṛta ubhayaḥ brahma iti ca ātmani sarva vikriyā pratiṣedhān

original: anyathā ca mumukṣūṇāṃ nirapavādavijñānānupapatte, suniścitārthatvānupapatteśca ;

analyzed: nirapavādam hi vijñānam sarva ākāṅkṣā nivartakam ātma viṣayam iṣyate vedānta vijñāna su niścita arthāḥ iti ca śruteḥ

original: ‘tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ' iti ca;

original: sthitaprajñalakṣaṇasmṛteśca |

original: sthite ca kṣetrajñaparamātmaikatvaviṣaye samyagdarśane kṣetrajñaḥ paramātmeti nāmamātrabhedātkṣetrajño'yaṃ paramātmano bhinnaḥ paramātmāyaṃ kṣetrajñādbhinna ityevaṃjātīyaka ātmabhedaviṣayo'yaṃ nirbandho nirarthakaeko hyayamātmā nāmamātrabhedena bahudhābhidhīyata iti |

original: ye tu nirbandhaṃ kurvanti, te vedāntārthaṃ bādhamānā śreyodvāraṃ samyagdarśanameva bādhante ;

original: nyāyena ca na saṃgacchanta iti ||
analyzed: nyāyena ca na saṃgacchante iti

original: prakṛtiśca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhāt ||

original: sa cāsminnapi loke iṣṭādibhiḥ karmabhi prīṇayanpaśuvaddevānāmupakaroti, amuṣminnapi loke tadupajīvī tadādiṣṭaṃ phalamupabhuñjānaḥ paśuvadeva devānāmupakarotīti gamyate ||

original: yathā kila kaścitsevaka sakalai sevopakaraṇai rājakulamupasṛptaśvirapravāsātparikṣīṇabahūpakaraṇachatrapādukādimātnāvaśeṣo na rājakule'vasthātuṃ śaknoti, evamanuśayamātraparigraho na candramaṇḍale'vasthātuṃ śaknotīti ||

original: tumbe na caitadyuktamiva |
